text: KXWI (98.5 MHz) is a radio station licensed to Williston, North Dakota, which serves northwestern North Dakota and northeastern Montana."Predicted Coverage Area for KXWI 98.5 FM", radio-locator.com. Retrieved July 9, 2019. The station airs a country music format and is owned by Williston Community Broadcasting.FM Query Results: KXWI, fcc.gov. Retrieved July 9, 2019. It began broadcasting in 2014. ==References== ==External links== *Marks Radio Group * XWI Category:Country radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in North Dakota
title: KXWI
